content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Patio de recreo':

content.stimulus_en: I (use to) ________ play with dolls.
They (not/like) ________ school much.
She (be) ________ very shy as a child.
What (be) ________ your favorite toy?
My favorite subject (be) ________ Art.
We (have) ________ a dog when I was little.
We didn't have to wear a uniform.
My friend best at school was called Mark.
I grew up in a very small village.
I to used spend hours playing outside.
I loved watching cartoons on Saturday mornings.
Primary was school a very happy time.
The past or related word for Recuerdo is '________'.
